alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 3:12PM AKST until December 26 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 9 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches, with localized amounts up to 18 inches. Blowing snow will cause reduced visibilities to one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...Noon Saturday to 9 PM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow and whiteout conditions over highway summits. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
